arts.ttl: US forward Folarin Balogun scores as Monaco wins 3-1 to go level with leader PSG
arts.sum: United States forward Folarin Balogun was among the scorers as Monaco followed up its Champions League win against Barcelona with a 3-1 victory over Le Havre in the French league on Sunday. Later Sunday, unbeaten Marseille will look to join them on points with victory at bitter rival Lyon on Sunday.

arts.ttl: PLAYER RATINGS | Monaco 3-1 Le Havre: Adi Hütter’s side avoid Champions League hangover to go top of Ligue 1
arts.sum: Ligue 1 McDonald’s, Round 5, 22/09/24 AS Monaco backed up their midweek UEFA Champions League triumph over Barcelona with a hard-fought victory over Le Havre AC (3-1), which puts them…

arts.ttl: George Ilenikhena breaks Kylian Mbappé’s AS Monaco record
arts.sum: It was a night for records to fall at the Stade Louis II. After a six-year absence from the UEFA Champions League, AS Monaco made their long-awaited return, against Barcelona,…

arts.ttl: Monaco predicted XI vs Le Havre: Folarin Balogun to start; Vanderson to miss out
arts.sum: Off the back of their historic win against Barcelona in the newly reformed UEFA Champions League, Monaco prepares to return to domestic action as they host Le Havre at the…

arts.ttl: Hansi Flick sends 'clear' warning to Marc-Andre ter Stegen over Monaco error
arts.sum: Hansi Flick has revealed he has given goalkeeper Marc-Andre ter Stegen "clear orders" to ensure there is not a repeat of his costly error in Barcelona's 2-1 defeat to Monaco. "Playing with his feet is one of Ter Stegen’s strengths, beyond just shot-stopping," Flick said.

arts.ttl: Barcelona boss Flick jumps to defence of under-fire Blaugrana star after Monaco loss
arts.sum: Barcelona head coach Hansi Flick has on Saturday launched a stern defence of a leading member of his squad. The player in question? Marc-André ter Stegen. The name of goalkeeper…

arts.ttl: Monaco’s Maghnes Akliouche rejects Algeria for France
arts.sum: According to a report by L’Équipe, Maghnes Akliouche (22) has rejected an offer from Algeria to represent Les Fennecs, as the young AS Monaco forward is instead prioritising representing France. …

arts.ttl: Barcelona star turns off Instagram comments after Monaco loss
arts.sum: A headline member of the first-team ranks at La Liga giants Barcelona has on Friday deactivated the comments section on his Instagram account. The player in question? Marc-André ter Stegen.…

arts.ttl: Preview: Monaco vs. Le Havre - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Sunday's Ligue 1 clash between Monaco and Le Havre, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.

arts.ttl: Details: Barcelona president Laporta holds meeting with Hansi Flick after Monaco loss
arts.sum: Barcelona president Joan Laporta called head coach Hansi Flick for a meeting, on the back of the club’s latest outing. That’s according to journalist Jose Alvarez Haya of El Chiringuito…
